jQuery HTML5文件上传插件 PekeUpload jQuery Plugin

Demos

1. - 基础版

Sample Code: 

$("#file").pekeUpload({maxSize:1,allowedExtensions:"jpeg|jpg|png|gif"});

2. - Twitter bootstrap 主题版

Sample Code: 

 $("#file2").pekeUpload({maxSize:1,theme:'bootstrap',allowedExtensions:"jpeg|jpg|png|gif"});

3. - 文件限制版

Sample Code: 

$("#file3").pekeUpload({maxSize:1,theme:'bootstrap', allowedExtensions:"jpeg|jpg|png|gif"});

4. - 单文件版

Sample Code: 

 $("#file4").pekeUpload({maxSize:1,theme:'bootstrap', multi:false,allowedExtensions:"jpeg|jpg|png|gif"});

5. - 带错误提示版

Sample Code: 

$("#file5").pekeUpload({maxSize:1,theme:'bootstrap', allowedExtensions:"jpeg|jpg|png|gif", onFileError:function(file,error){alert("error on file: "+file.name+" error: "+error+"")}});
